caption: Laughed through the whole experience.  Me and my girlfriend played the Aladdin room. Awesome decoration, perfect size and difficulty for 2-3 people. Lots of sound effects that helped tell us when we solved a problem. Sometimes that can be tricky to know if you have solved a puzzle or not. But that was not a problem here!  The game master knew exactly when to help us out in the different situations, even gave us some extra laughs.  Big cred to both the game masters that were on site. Even got a photo afterwards as a memory to keep üôåüèª  Will definitely come back next time we visit Paris  üëèüèª

Very well thought out games. The reception area is pretty too unlike most of these places. Staff really helpful, and perfect English. We did the metro game which was really hard, only 2 of us played and we just made it out. Would do the other games here if we visit Paris again
Enjoyed it very much! Kind staff with humor! Would play one more room if I stayed in Paris longer. We played Aladdin

Really good escape room with a different theme. We did the plant room and it was very enjoyable and very well designed with some interesting features. Corto was the games master and was brilliant giving clues appropriately and doing his best to add to a sense of drama. His English was perfect. Merci

We had a great time here, the theme and decorations are on point and the staff were super friendly :D We did Escape the metro, which was maybe a bit ambitious for our first ever escape room.. We didn't escape!! But we had a great time... Thank you!!

Really good Escape Room as we have come to expect from Escape Hunt.  We played Pursuit in the Metro. There were just 2 of us this time and we have successfully completed 30+ different rooms around the world and we definitely found this one to be challenging (in a good way).  Everything was in both English and French and easy to follow. We got out with only seconds to spare, so it kept us guessing for the full hour and we weren't sure we'd get out which would have been only the second time ever! Definitely recommend!

Both of the rooms available were excellent! I recommend doing either one, or both like we did. Special shoutout to the game master R√©douane, who was amazing and guided us through in English without problems. He was actually part of the reason why we ended up doing a second room. He‚Äôs also a great person to have a conversation with about escape rooms after! A real enthusiast, not just someone who happens to work there.
Our group of 2 had a blast, although it was one of the harder escape rooms we've done. Our host was super friendly and gave us a few tips when we needed them.
Immersive story from the beginning, interesting puzzles, and very friendly staff. Hints are in both French and English. Our group enjoyed it a lot
Really fun. The Metro game and the staff were great at catering to us English speakers.
A bit difficult (the metro station), we couldn't finish within the time limit, but if you are a veterant you probably can advance pretty far. Enjoy !

One hour and a half to kill ? Just go there you won't regret, and I'm sure you'll have a blast with your friends family or colleagues, the team there is just perfect and they take care of you since the beginning, i will come back for sure ! Thank you guys again ...
Was great, very fun great set design and was not too challenging
Nice experience! We managed to finish the help of the staff who are very friendly
Good fun, amazing staff. Would recommend for good time between friends.
Great escape game, kind of not an easy one but a lot of fun
Really long and well made escape rooms. Very difficult for a 2 man team though.
I have been to a few escape games. This one is pretty good but not the best of the best.
We had the best fun ever
Good escape game in Paris. One of the few available in English
This Escape game was just amazing and it was not too easy which is important.
Great time. Great price. Well worth it...
We had so much fun!
One of the best escape the room games I played.
Great story and challenging room.
1er escape game. Decor au top
Loved it
Cool
Top!
Top
Great place
FUN FUN FUN

Great escape game! Thanks to Lino for really setting the mood and getting us into the theme! It explains the story very well, we feel directly in it, frankly I recommend it 100% Great to do with family really I don't know what to say other than great thanks to Lino and we will come back for sure to do be Aladdin be the metro !

Welcoming, smiling staff. The explanations given are clear. The adventure at Alladin's was great, fun and enjoyable. It's a very pleasant moment and I would do it again. I was won over by our prayer experience. Thanks to the whole team.

We tested the Green House room and frankly nothing to complain about, the decorations, the atmosphere and the puzzles are great. Very good time spent with Samia who knew how to immerse us in the story and accompany us throughout the game.

We went to Escape Hunt with international students from the Faculty of Sciences of Paris Cit√© University and we warmly recommend the experience! Great welcome from the team, the sessions are available in English and the students enjoyed the experience :) Looking forward to coming back with new international students to challenge them to solve new puzzles!

Great time spent with family. We managed to free the genie! The Alladin game is beautiful with three rooms and lots of chests to open. Samia our gamemaster was super welcoming and her help was very useful üòâ I highly recommend! üëç ‚Ä¶

As soon as we arrived, the welcome was very warm and we immediately felt at ease. (Thank you Lino!) The gamemaster knew how to make the experience even more fun with his humor and sympathy. Even though we didn't manage to solve the riddle, we had a lot of laughs and enjoyed every minute of it. He was present throughout the activity, guiding and encouraging us. Thank you for this memorable experience! We highly recommend this escape game to anyone looking to have a good time.
